thread.title: Mattis: can't say yet if Olympics thaw will have traction

title: Mattis: can't say yet if Olympics thaw will have traction
text:
Mattis: can't say yet if Olympics thaw will have traction 12:40pm IST - 00:56 
U.S. Defense Secretary Jim Mattis said on Sunday it was too early to tell whether a diplomatic detente between the two Koreas at the Winter Olympics would lead to results, and added that the move had not driven a wedge between Washington and Seoul. Rough cut (no reporter narration).
